V03vinv03_u:138_4: teṣām evaṃ bhavati / niyatam āyuṣmatāṃ cāturmāsikī pravāraṇā bhaviṣyatīti /
V03vinv03_u:138_5: tataḥ paścāt tair gatavegair gatapratyarthibhiḥ punar api pravārayitavyaṃ :
V03vinv03_u:139_1: yathāpi tat tad eva pravāraṇāyāṃ paṃcadaśyāṃ glānaḥ aglānasya pravāraṇāṃ sthāpayati.
V03vinv03_u:140_1: yathāpi tat tad eva pravāraṇāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ aglānaḥ glānasya pravāraṇāṃ [Pravā-v_174] sthāpayati.
V03vinv03_u:141_1: yathāpi tat tad eva pravāraṇāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ glānaḥ glānasya dūtena pravāraṇāṃ sthāpayati.
V03vinv03_u:142_1: yathāpi tat tad eva pravāraṇāyāṃ (74r) pañcadaśyām aglāno glānasya pravāraṇāṃ dūtena sthāpayati.
V03vinv03_u:143_0: folio 74 is lost, therefore the Sanskrit text of Pravā-v 14.1 to 14.2.4 is not extant.
